A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi completely ruins the story arc of Luke Skywalker from the original trilogy\, as well as destroying any of the questions or mysteries left over from The Force Awakens in a poorly attempted way to try and write out things they had no idea how to answer. The only question I have for this series is\, how are you going to get me to care about Episode IX?
